text: Euspondylus monsfumus is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Venezuela. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 2001 Category:Taxa named by Abraham Mijares- Urrutia Category:Taxa named by Josefa Celsa Señaris Category:Taxa named by Alexis Arends Rodríguez
title: Euspondylus monsfumus
